spirit:field.spirit:name: major
spirit:field.spirit:description: Major version

spirit:field.spirit:name: minor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minor version

spirit:field.spirit:name: patch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Patch version

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_clear
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full status field. A 1 indicates an almost full or full FIFO. This bit is set when there are between fifo_aft and fifo_depth number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty status field. A 1 indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. This bit is set when there are between 0 and fifo_aet number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status field. A 1 indicates a full FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status field. A 1 indicates an empty FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aft
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aet
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth (always 1 byte wide)

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_clear
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full status field. A 1 indicates an almost full or full FIFO. This bit is set when there are between fifo_aft and fifo_depth number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty status field. A 1 indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. This bit is set when there are between 0 and fifo_aet number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status field. A 1 indicates a full FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status field. A 1 indicates an empty FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aft
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aet
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth (always 1 byte wide)

spirit:field.spirit:name: no_device_busy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Prevent HW setting device_busy

spirit:field.spirit:name: no_reply_data_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Prevent HW clearing the reply_data_rdy

spirit:field.spirit:name: no_status
spirit:field.spirit:description: Do not send the status byte

spirit:field.spirit:name: stop_clks
spirit:field.spirit:description: Declare a start (P) if there were at least stop_clks + 2 clock cycles between the SCL rising edge and the SDA rising edge

spirit:field.spirit:name: start_clks
spirit:field.spirit:description: Declare a start (S) if there were at least start_clks + 2 clock cycles between the SDA falling edge and the SCL falling edge

spirit:field.spirit:name: sda_glitch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Filter glitches up to this number + 1 clock cycles on the SDA line

spirit:field.spirit:name: scl_glitch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Filter glitches up to this number + 1 clock cycles on the SCL line

spirit:field.spirit:name: clock_stretch_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enable clock stretching - Active High

spirit:field.spirit:name: slave_addr_ack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Slave address ACK - Active High

spirit:field.spirit:name: slave_addr
spirit:field.spirit:description: Slave address

spirit:field.spirit:name: val
spirit:field.spirit:description: Timeout value in number of clock cycles (SMBus) A value of 0x0 disables the timeout (I2C)

spirit:field.spirit:name: device_busy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Device Busy - set by the hardware at the end of a transaction by the Master that writes to the request data area. Cleared by the slave CPU when it has read the data and responded to the command.

spirit:field.spirit:name: req_nak
spirit:field.spirit:description: Request NAK - set by the slave if a request could not be filled; the reply data will need to be read before the hardware will clear this bit (same as Reply Data Ready)

spirit:field.spirit:name: rsvd5
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved for SW

spirit:field.spirit:name: rsvd4
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved for SW

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_data_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reply Data Ready - set by SW when data is ready for the master; cleared by HW when the output FIFO is empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_req
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reply Request - indicates the type of data the slave has for the master. If set, the data is a reply to a previous request from the master. If cleared, this is unsolicited status information the slave has for the master

spirit:field.spirit:name: rsvd1
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved for SW

spirit:field.spirit:name: rsvd0
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved for SW

spirit:field.spirit:name: wr_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Byte to write into the output FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rd_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Byte to read from the input FIFO.

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_data_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reply data ready

spirit:field.spirit:name: device_busy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Device busy

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Output FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Output FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty when this interrupt is enabled, it will cause an interrupt right away!

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Input FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Input FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty when this interrupt is enabled, it will cause an interrupt right away!

spirit:field.spirit:name: write_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write data was NACK-ed by the slave

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Read data was NACK-ed by the master

spirit:field.spirit:name: no_read_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Read data is requested but there is no data to provide (slave is clock stretching if enabled or else returning all 1s)

spirit:field.spirit:name: timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: SCL was low for timeout.val module clock cycles

spirit:field.spirit:name: write
spirit:field.spirit:description: The bit after an acknowledged slave address indicates a write operation

spirit:field.spirit:name: read
spirit:field.spirit:description: The bit after an acknowledged slave address indicates a read operation

spirit:field.spirit:name: stop
spirit:field.spirit:description: Stop bit detected

spirit:field.spirit:name: start
spirit:field.spirit:description: Start or Repeated Start bit detected

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Pending register - This indicates which events are pending, Write 1 to clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_data_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Reply data ready

spirit:field.spirit:name: device_busy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Device busy

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Output FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Output FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty, this event is pending and if enabled will cause an interrupt!

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Input FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Input FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty, this event is pending and if enabled will cause an interrupt!

spirit:field.spirit:name: write_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Write NACK

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Read NACK

spirit:field.spirit:name: no_read_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High No Read Data

spirit:field.spirit:name: timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Timeout

spirit:field.spirit:name: write
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Write

spirit:field.spirit:name: read
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Read

spirit:field.spirit:name: stop
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Stop

spirit:field.spirit:name: start
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Start

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which pending events are enabled to cause an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_data_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Reply data ready

spirit:field.spirit:name: device_busy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Device busy

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Output FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Output FIFO almost empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High Input FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High Input FIFO almost empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: write_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Write NACK

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Read NACK

spirit:field.spirit:name: no_read_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High No Read Data

spirit:field.spirit:name: timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Timeout

spirit:field.spirit:name: write
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Write

spirit:field.spirit:name: read
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Read

spirit:field.spirit:name: stop
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Stop

spirit:field.spirit:name: start
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active-High Start

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

spirit:field.spirit:name: reply_data_rdy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the reply data ready flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: device_busy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the device busy flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the output FIFO almost full flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: out_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the output FIFO almost empty flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the input FIFO almost full flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: in_fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the input FIFO almost empty flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: write_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the write nack flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_nack
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the read nack flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: no_read_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the no read data flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the timeout flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: write
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the write flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: read
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the read flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: stop
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the stop flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: start
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the start flag (Active-High)

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
